trans-unit.source: Provides a method you can use to create Ribbon controls at run time in an application-level add-in.
trans-unit.target: 提供在应用程序级外接程序中可用于在运行时创建功能区控件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To get a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Factory> object, use the `Globals.Factory` property in your project.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Factory>对象，请使用`Globals.Factory`项目中的属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Global Access to Objects in Office Projects](/visualstudio/vsto/global-access-to-objects-in-office-projects.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[对 Office 项目中对象的全局访问](/visualstudio/vsto/global-access-to-objects-in-office-projects.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that you can use to create Ribbon controls at run time.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个可用于在运行时创建功能区控件的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that you can use to create Ribbon controls at run time.
trans-unit.target: 一个可用于在运行时创建功能区控件的对象。

trans-unit.source: When you create a Ribbon control at run time, you can add it to a custom Ribbon that you created by using the **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** project item in an Office project.
trans-unit.target: 当在运行时创建的功能区控件时，可以将其添加到通过创建自定义功能区**功能区 （可视化设计器）** Office 项目中的项目项。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。
